question:
Sumit is tired. Where will sumit go?
(1) garden (2) tired (3) thirsty (4) kitchen (5) bored (6) bedroom
answer: If Sumit is tired, he will likely go to the bedroom to rest and sleep. So the answer is: (6) bedroom. </s>
